channel.title: [Island-War] Daily Updates - Balanced Economy - Unique Content - Grand Exchange
channel.description:
[URL=http://"http://www.island-war.zz.mu"][CENTER][img]http://s27.postimg.org/5y0nt8uj7/Banner.png[/img][/CENTER][/URL]
[B][U][I][SIZE=5][CENTER]What is Island-War ?
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://island-war.zz.mu"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://island-war.zz.mu/forum"]Forum[/URL] [URL=http://"http://island-war.zz.mu/Island_War.jar"]Download Client[/URL][/CENTER]
Features[/CENTER][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
-All Gwd bosses *with a small killcount* -Clan Wars (choose wisely there are tons of server features sooon to be based on clans) -QBD full with cutscenes -Vote/Loyalty Rewards -PvM point system with rewards -Flawless item switching -Glacors -Drygors -Royal C'Bow -Seismic Weaponry -Virago -Scarlet Spiritshield (Merge all 4 into one ultimate shield) -Lottery system -Pyramid Plunder -Duel Arena -Grand Exchange -Working lend system -Squeel Rewards -Prestige System -Donator shops/custom pets -Soul wars -Castle Wars -Runespan -Puro Puro -Easy to use in game ticket system -Fight caves Full -Kiln -Warrior guild -Fully customizeable clan options (capes, ranks, vex, citadel coming soon) -Ascension dungeon (coming soon) -Coop slayer - 25 Custom bosses - 25/25 Skills working - Prestige system up to 10 prestiges - Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time - 5 Quests - Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture - Pk Points - The Abyss 100% like Real RuneScape - Full Living Rock Caverns - Clue Scrolls - Over 20 NPC caves - Penguin Hide and Seek - 100% Bird’s Nests like RS - Over 150 customs items ! [U][B]-MUCH MUCH MORE![/B][/U]
[SPOILER=Media][QUOTE][CENTER]Media[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/6prif6ygx/Clue_Scroll.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/6jdtc3pc1/Customs.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/7tg84w8ht/Dwarf.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/r8mek9ce9/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/qhtoeha0x/Lottery.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/6tlbvg3y9/Minigames.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/vdxb66a69/Skilling.png[/img] [/QUOTE][/SPOILER] More coming soon ! Please stay tuned !
[B][U][SIZE=5][CENTER]Youtube Video[/CENTER][/SIZE][/U][/B]
Soon !
[B][I][I][U][SIZE=5][CENTER]Staff[/CENTER][/SIZE][/U][/I][/I][/B] [QUOTE][/QUOTE] Owner-Bader Admin - Matthew Mods - 3 free spot.
Join us now for the best 718 RSPS experiment.

item.title: [Island-War] Daily Updates - Balanced Economy - Unique Content - Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

First of all you need to fix your thread.

I think it has some decent content. But I can’t see many people playing this just because of the revision. There isn’t a big fan base for that sort of revision. I won’t play this, but goodluck anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: [Island-War] Daily Updates - Balanced Economy - Unique Content - Grand Exchange

item.title: [Island-War] Daily Updates - Balanced Economy - Unique Content - Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @bader bader
item.description:
@bader wrote:

[URL=http://“http://www.island-war.zz.mu”][CENTER][/CENTER][/URL]

[B][U][I][SIZE=5][CENTER]What is Island-War ?

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://island-war.zz.mu”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://island-war.zz.mu/forum”]Forum[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://island-war.zz.mu/Island_War.jar”]Download Client[/URL][/CENTER]

Features[/CENTER][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]

-All Gwd bosses with a small killcount
-Clan Wars (choose wisely there are tons of server features sooon to be based on clans)
-QBD full with cutscenes
-Vote/Loyalty Rewards
-PvM point system with rewards
-Flawless item switching
-Glacors
-Drygors
-Royal C’Bow
-Seismic Weaponry
-Virago
-Scarlet Spiritshield (Merge all 4 into one ultimate shield)
-Lottery system
-Pyramid Plunder
-Duel Arena
-Grand Exchange
-Working lend system
-Squeel Rewards
-Prestige System
-Donator shops/custom pets
-Soul wars
-Castle Wars
-Runespan
-Puro Puro
-Easy to use in game ticket system
-Fight caves Full
-Kiln
-Warrior guild
-Fully customizeable clan options (capes, ranks, vex, citadel coming soon)
-Ascension dungeon (coming soon)
-Coop slayer

  • 25 Custom bosses
  • 25/25 Skills working
  • Prestige system up to 10 prestiges
  • Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time
  • 5 Quests
  • Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture
  • Pk Points
  • The Abyss 100% like Real RuneScape
  • Full Living Rock Caverns
  • Clue Scrolls
  • Over 20 NPC caves
  • Penguin Hide and Seek
  • 100% Bird’s Nests like RS
  • Over 150 customs items !
    [U][B]-MUCH MUCH MORE![/B][/U]

[SPOILER=Media][QUOTE][CENTER]Media[/CENTER]








[/QUOTE][/SPOILER]
More coming soon ! Please stay tuned !

[B][U][SIZE=5][CENTER]Youtube Video[/CENTER][/SIZE][/U][/B]

Soon !

[B][I][I][U][SIZE=5][CENTER]Staff[/CENTER][/SIZE][/U][/I][/I][/B]

[QUOTE][/QUOTE]
Owner-Bader
Admin - Matthew
Mods - 3 free spot.

Join us now for the best 718 RSPS experiment.
